Function reference

Cleaning data

Recoding

recode_ctract()
Recode VRBIS Census Tract
recode_gender()
Recode Gender/Sex in CalREDIE
recode_orientation()
Recode Sexual Orientation in CalREDIE
recode_race()
Recode Race/Ethnicity
age_groups()
Create age groups.
clean_address()
Clean patient/record address
clean_phone()
Clean Phone Number
vrbis_manner_death()
Recode VRBIS Manner of Death
vrbis_place_death()
Recode VRBIS Place of Death
vrbis_resident()
Algorithm for Death Certificate Inclusion
baby_name()
Remove Baby Name in CAIR2
pretty_words()
Messy String to Title Casing

Data Visualization

Several team approaches to extend ggplot2.

theme_apollo()
Apollo Theme
apollo_label()
Apollo Label
wrap_labels()
Wrap Long Axis Labels
cdcd_color()
Use Team Colors in Plots
geom_dumbbell() GeomDumbbell
Dumbbell Plot
geom_lollipop() GeomLollipop
Lollipop Plot
highlight_geom()
Highlight Geom Using Expression
highlight_title()
Highlight Keywords in ggplot2 Title

Dates

Common date conversions following but not limited toMMWR schema.

week_ending_date()
Week Ending Date
mmwr_calendar()
Create MMWR Calendar
mmwr_week()
Date to MMWR Disease Week
mmwr_year()
Date to MMWR Year
mmwrweek_to_date()
Convert Disease Week to Week Ending Date
total_weeks()
Calculate Total Disease Weeks for Year
to_month()
Date to Month Date
time_between()
Calculate Time Between Two Dates
assign_season()
Assign Respiratory Season
end_points()
Subset Data To Label Line Plot

Misc. Helpers

suppress()
Data Suppression for Low Category Frequencies
hiv_redact()
Redact HIV/AIDS from Dataframe
remove_empty_cols()
Remove Empty Columns
rate_per_100k()
Calculate Incidence Rate per 100,000
add_percent()
Add Proportion
n_percent()
Plot Labels for Counts & Proportion
